mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.name as match_user_name,t2.head,t3.short_name as project_name, t4.created_time as prepare_time, t4.expired as prepare_expired from busi_customer t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.match_user_id=t2.user_id left join busi_project t3 on t1.project_id=t3.id left join busi_prepare t4 on t1.id=t4.customer_id where t1.mobile_phone like '%${mobilePhone}' and exists(select 1 from busi_user_project t0 where t0.project_id=t1.project_id and t0.user_id=#{userId})
